page.title: 05Going to School
page.content:
Currently, the education of young people in the block displays two approaches: { 1.Rhymney Valley} Machen children are taught at primary school until 11, when they proceed to an 11-18 comprehensive school in Bedwas. Machen & Bedwas are in Mid-Glamorgan.
{ 2.Ebbw Valley} There are primary schools at Risca, Wattsville, Crosskeys, Waunfawr, Pontymister, Danygraig and Ty-isaf. At 11, children of the area go to Cwmcarn or Risca Comprehensive schools and at 16, having taken "O"level or C.S.E., they can go on to Crosskeys Tertiary College to take academic or vocational courses (see"Crosskeys College"). This area is in the county of Gwent.
